title: Kenny Rogers - Amazing Grace (2012)(gnv64)
description:
Fully aware that his audience demographic has shifted and grown older, 
Kenny Rogers turned to gospel music for 2011's The Love of God, 
a collection of gospel hymns and praise & worship-type inspirational songs. 
Working with producers Warren Hartman and Kyle Lehning, and recorded at the Compound 
in Nashville with some of Music City's finest session players, 
Rogers initially issued the album only through Cracker Barrel locations. 
Gaither Music picked up the distribution rights a year later and re-released 
The Love of God in 2012 with a different cover and a new title, Amazing Grace. 
Under either title, it's actually an interesting set, with guest contributions 
from the Whites ("I'll Fly Away"), female Christian group Point of Grace ("Circle of Friends"), 
and country duo Winfield's Locket ("In the Sweet By and By"). 

Recording information: Sound Emporium, Nashville, TN; The Compound, Nashville, TN. 
Photographer: Kenny Rogers. 
Arranger: Warren Hartman. 
Personnel: Kenny Rogers (vocals); Bryan Sutton (acoustic guitar, banjo, mandolin); 
Mark Casstevens (acoustic guitar); Pat Buchanan, Brent Mason (electric guitar); 
Russ Pahl (steel guitar); Jerry Douglas (dobro); Larry Franklin (fiddle); 
John Jarvis (piano, Fender Rhodes piano, Wurlitzer piano); Pat Coil (piano); 
Gordon Mote (Hammond b-3 organ); Viktor Krauss (acoustic bass, electric bass); 
Steve Brewster (drums, percussion); Eric Darken (percussion). 
Audio Mixer: Kyle Lehning.
